mapper.sql: id, trainer_id, member_id, operater_id, start_time, end_time

rtl.id, rtl.trainer_id, rtl.member_id, rtl.operater_id, rtl.start_time, rtl.end_time, operater.name as operater_name, -- datediff(rtl.end_time,rtl.start_time)*trainer.price as total_amount, rtl.total_amount, employee.name as trainer_name
mapper.select:
select
from rend_trainer_log as rtl,operater,trainer,employee where rtl.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and operater.operater_id = rtl.operater_id and trainer.trainer_id = rtl.trainer_id and employee.id = trainer.trainer_id
mapper.insert:
insert into rend_trainer_log
id,
trainer_id,
member_id,
operater_id,
start_time,
end_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{trainerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update rend_trainer_log
trainer_id = #{trainerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operater_id = #{operaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rend_trainer_log set trainer_id = #{trainerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operater_id = #{operaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
